item.title: Distributed Python: Celery
item.author: Miguel Ángel
item.description:
Nowadays, SOA architectures is in fashion. These architectures use little and very specific services, so they interact each other.

In this post I’ll show how to use Celery in order to create a SOA architecture.

item.title: Why Python rocks
item.author: Miguel Ángel
item.description:
After writting the article Why Java rocks, I have no other option than writting why Python rocks.

Before starting, I might advise you that Python is my favourite language. And this is like search your best friends defects.
